website_summaries.verdict: Steam your rice and vegetables at the same time with this 2-tier stackable steaming system.
pros: 2-tier stackable pans to steam different foods simultaneously
Pans made from food-grade stainless steel
Lids trap in heat and moisture
Solid handle for easy insertion and removal
Can be used to cook cheesecake and lasagna, too
cons: Bottom pan will cook slightly faster than the top pan
May arrive with a little black manufacturing residue under the rim
which can be cleaned with paper towel

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure I would like these little pots
customer_reviews.text: First time using these stackable pans to reheat food. I put pork roast slices on the bottom with juices from the roast, and fresh cooped cauliflower, broccoli, zucchini, and red pepper chunks on the top with just a bit of water and the top with holes. Steamed under pressure for 5 min and let the pressure drop naturally. The meat was hot and moist. The veggies were crisp tender. I wasn't sure I would like these little pots, but they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double the Cooking!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received this item I made a double stack lasagna in my Instant Pot. I’m glad I added a bit more time to the cooking as it was defenetly required. Be sure to dry the pans throughly before storing to keep them rust free.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: black residue coming out the pot!
customer_reviews.text: They shipped immediately, and I was very excited to use it. I hand washed the pots right away then I used it to cook rice and vegetables. I was very happy with the results everything came out perfect. I stored the leftover rice in the pot, and when I finally washed it, there was some black stuff coming out. I read someone else had the same issue!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of two

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of steamer pans! Fit perfectly in my 6qt Ultra Instant Pot! Nice gauge of stainless steel and very highly polished on pans, lid and holder- great quality, as it should be at $39. Heavy duty honeycombed silicone trivet. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing chemicals left on product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this without reading enough reviews. Like other people, mine had some type of polishing compound under the rolled edges on every piece. It is similar to Flitz metal polish. I tried cleaning it with 90% isopropyl alcohol, a toothbrush and cotton swabs prior to running it through the dishwasher. Still, the polishing compound remains. It's highly disappointing that the manufacturer doesn't properly clean this product after the manufacturing process. It's a health risk to ship products used for food preparation without removing all chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip D.

customer_reviews.title: ... it so far only once but it worked out great, had salmon on the bottom pan and frozen ...
customer_reviews.text: used it so far only once but it worked out great, had salmon on the bottom pan and frozen vegetables on top pan without lid, on 4 minutes, should have used 5 minutes, because the beans were a little hard, or next time put less vegetables in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean the stacking groove!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pans except for two things. First and foremost, if you DON'T spray them with Pam or something like it before cooking a casserole or equivalent, food will be extremely hard to remove. I had to soak mine overnight and still had to scrub like crazy to remove egg/potato casserole. Second, the little "rim" toward the bottom that allows the pans to stack is HORRIBLE to try to clean! Why couldn't they have made these so that the rim was only on the outside and on evident on the inside? I spent 30 minutes cleaning both of these with toothbrush and scrub brush after forgetting to spray them........ Wish there was a teflon coated or equivalent version.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dilbeck

customer_reviews.title: There is black gunk lubrication on the Groove
customer_reviews.text: When you first get this, I suggest you use baking soda with dishwashing liquid and scrub pad and scrub the inside groove. There is a blackish gunk in it. My suspicion is when they manufactured this item, the machinery had doused this lubricant to avoid friction when fabricating these stainless steel containers. Do it several times as long as you get black gunk when you run a paper towel in the inside groove. Black gunk will be in the paper towel. You know you got it all if your paper towel is coming back clean.
customer_reviews.author: Virgilio

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for, and they are heavier duty than what I was expecting. I have a 6 qt Instant Pot, and these fit perfectly on top of the low trivet that came with my IP, and allow enough room to close the lid. Now I need to experiment to see how much I need to adjust my cooking times. I didn't have problems with black junk on my pans as some of the reviewers mentioned--just a couple of tiny spots in the holes in the steamer lid which came off easily with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I have the 6 quart instant pot duo . I purchased this accessory to increase the function and flexibility of my instant pot . I love being able to cook the protein in one pot and the vegetables in the other right at the same time . These two stainless steel pot in pots are just as they were advertised . Beautifully made find quality very heavy stainless steel . The silicone trivet is a great bonus because it can be used with the instant pot liner as well, it will protect the counter.I am very pleased with my purchase from this company .
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: These work great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my needs. I made honey sesame chicken and cooked the accompanying rice at the same time: all in my Instant Pot. Rice came out perfect. I recommend purchasing a wire stand (the pressure cooker egg stand duo gives you two height options) to place one of these pots over your main meal. Couldn't be easier!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: YouTube is a good source. I'm new to instant pot cooking
customer_reviews.text: It came with instructions, but wasn't enough for me. So I ad to do research on how to apply when cooking in my instant pot. YouTube is a good source. I'm new to instant pot cooking, but so far I like it a lot. With Aozita Stackable one can have a complete meal in a short time.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Stackable pans that fit Mealthy Multipot
customer_reviews.text: This stackable pan set fits perfectly in the Mealthy Multipot. The construction appears to be of high quality steel, the components like lids fit together well, and the whole design seems well thought out. The silicon hot pad is a nice addition for setting the stackable pan set on the counter when you remove it from the pressure cooker. The first thing I tried to cook worked extremely well: brown Jasmine rice took about 16 minutes on Steam setting, high pressure, with 1.25 cups of water in the stackable pan, and about 1 cup water in the pressure cooker insert.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But so glad I went ahead and ordered it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical after reading some of the reviews. But so glad I went ahead and ordered it. I absolutely love it. I've used it several times now and I only received it a few days ago. I highly recoment these stackable pans!
customer_reviews.author: La Donna Meier

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addon for an Instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set after getting an instant pot. They work great and are easy to use but beware they come with leftover traces of polishing compound. Be sure you wash thoroughly before you use them. I heated them in the oven for a few minutes to get the stuff out of the rolled rim. It is not poison but I am sure it is also not good for you. Clean them well before you use!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Instant pot fans this is a must have accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Love this more than any accessory I have purchased! I use it daily for cooling pot in pot. With this set I never have a burn notice or my chicken turn out dry. It makes clean up so much easier! The hanger is wonderful for taking hot items out of the pot without spilling or being burnt!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Wagonschutz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel but this is made of looks great and it seems durable but not sure since I haven't used it. The wire trivet that holds it together is awkward to say the least. Also I didn't really think about it when I saw that it was good for the 5, 6, or 8 quart but what this means is that it's quite small in the 8 quart.
customer_reviews.author: Believing

customer_reviews.title: Returned...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about these pans, but there was black oil or something all over it. At first I didn't notice it until I started to wash them. I am very disappointed. I don't have the time or patience to scrub a brand new pan.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: use to make cheescake and it comes out perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only issue with this is using a brush in the groove of the lid to make sure it is clean. other than that I have used it for fish, meatloaf, cheesecake. I use ground turkey for the meatloaf and the fat comes out and is easily poured into a glass container for disposal - GREAT. easy in and out of the instant pot - do not forget to use the instant pot trivit. WHEN INSERTING MAKE SURE THE HANDLES ARE NOT NEAR THE STEAM RELEASE OF POP UP VALVE.
customer_reviews.author: johns review

customer_reviews.title: Want to play a game?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a fricking jigsaw puzzle. It takes more effort to put the thing together to get it to fit inside the instant pot properly than to just cook things separately. Additionally, the water gets inside the lower level because there’s no set “locking” mechanism. Lazy people beware: you get more than you bargain for. On the plus side, you get 2 very sturdy dog water bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Itzel

customer_reviews.title: Great for reheating food
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to reheat food in my Instant pot, to get away from using the microwave. They work great! More than enough room for two people's meals. I use the silicone mat as a trivet for the hot steamer. They are easy to clean, either hand washing or put in the dishwasher. The only down side, they are a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M.

customer_reviews.title: handles don't work properly
customer_reviews.text: The handle came out of the box in pieces. After struggling to put it back together it doesn't close over the pans as required. I was very disappointed with this product and feel I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: What a clever, useful and well designed piece of equipment. Arrived today and I made rice and steamed veggies in it for dinner. A snap to use, both foods were done well and cleanup took no time at all. This is the perfect Instant Pot companion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and am impressed with their quality. I've used them to reheat different foods and it was awesome. We are trying to wean ourselves from the microwave and this helps tremendously. I hand wash and dry as directed. I'm looking forward to using them often.
customer_reviews.author: DMD, faithful reader

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean, hard to use, the wire hook thingy that is suppose to keep it closed stops keeping it closed and stops closing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased when I opened the package!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use these new pans yet. But they are exceptionally nice quality. I love the carrier/lifter to lift the pans into and out of the pot and that holds the pans together when stacking them in the pot. I do not have an Instant Pot, but I have an Express Pot made by Crock Pot, which is very similar and does the same things that the Instant Pot does. These pans fit in my pot perfectly. They are large enough to cook a good sized meal. I look forward to using them often.
customer_reviews.author: mamajann

customer_reviews.title: fits well into the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: this steamer cooks evenly and does well for two dishes. Easy to clean. Draw back? Took me a long time to figure out how to lock the handles when using both pans (leave off the bottom lid)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory,
customer_reviews.text: Made a Spanish cheese flan desert that normally takes 1 hr in the oven. It took 20 minutes using these insert pans with my Insant Pot. Great accessory,
customer_reviews.author: CLS8202

customer_reviews.title: Works as I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait at least a month to say my thoughts on it. Mainly got this product for baking things such as banana bread, brownies and so on in the Instapot and it does it just as I wanted it to and more, no problems so far honestly. Definitely would recommend to a friend, thanks for the product.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: They are so awesome looking. I plan to use tonight
customer_reviews.text: I am knew to instant pot cooking. I am excited to use these new pots. They are so awesome looking. I plan to use tonight. Great experience with the company. One question I received a second cover with a few holes that aren’t listed in what I would receive. Just not sure how I use? Great product
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: So far looks good
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them yet so I gave them a 5 for quality will update once I do use them. the pots look good, sturdy. look like good quality. shiny no black goo. everything fits well All parts are there and the silicon trivit is great!
customer_reviews.author: W.O.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent!
customer_reviews.text: WELL...... I have no idea what was actually sent to me?? What I received was what looks to be 1 small metal bowl type thing and nothing else. So I will be ordering another one, returning what I received and hopefully I get what I actually purchased because I really can’t wait to try it with my Instapot!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Know Your Volume
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It allows cooking two food types, that you don't want mixed, to be cooked at he same time. The time have to be the same for both food types and you must know that your food type volume will not over fill either container. Easy to use, easy to clean and very great included handle for lower and removing from the pot. I recommend the product for when you need to cook two food types at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Works good using the pot-in-pot technique with the Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a recommendation from Karen Peterson to reheat food and cook in the Instant Pot. I made a Lasagna so far, and it was a success. Looking forward to making a lot more with this using the pot-in-pot technique.
customer_reviews.author: Mark MasakiTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stainless steel .
customer_reviews.text: Ooh .. I love this product very much ! Cooking my rice and my curry at the same time . Pot in Pot fits right into my Instant Pot Duo 6Q easily. A great partner with Instant Pot. Comes with a silicon mat, a second cover for steaming or venting. Handle clips securely!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisiow62

customer_reviews.title: Good quality set for pot in pot cooking
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made with good SS. Have used to make many pot in pot meals in the Instant Pot. For me there was a learning curve but not bad. I make a lot of rice and since getting these it’s my preferred method. No sticking and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check for everything
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine for pot In pot cooking but I was missing one of the lids (the one with the holes). I bought this a long time ago and just recently opened it, so I didn’t know that I was missing the lid. I’m limited in what I could do because I can’t use it to steam.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: handles don't close anymore
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed great until more users. I tried to make two meals in each of the containers simultaneously and the handle no longer closes at top to fold over so I can submerge the whole thing in instant pot! Not sure if the heat bendy it out of shape, but it's not usable. I'm returning it. idk if this happened to anyone else?
customer_reviews.author: Jonelle

customer_reviews.title: Good material but left black marking
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sturdy material. Used this to make cheesecake since I didn’t have anything that fit into my IP. Worked very well. Only downside is the black mark on paper towel when I was drying it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Black residues in the folds and in the food
customer_reviews.text: NO matter how I much I clean this product, black residue contaminates the food. How come?? How healthy is that?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This is not a steamer
customer_reviews.text: This is 2 double boilers. Not good for steaming vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Djay

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The handles of the trivet are useless in the hot environment. Fiddly to connect. So the pots are very difficult to get out. Also the stainless steel has to be completely dried by hand to remove water spots. SB
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work just perfect with my 6 qt
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to Aozita Stackable Steamer Insert Pans! They work just perfect with my 6 qt. Instant Pot!! Good quality and sturdy. I'd highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stainless stacking pans
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use in my 6 qt. Instant Pot. They are very attractive. I shine them up and attach them together and smile. Of course they are great to use also, which was the idea to start with. But I do like lovely items.
customer_reviews.author: NanA

customer_reviews.title: Item exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I used one pan for a meatloaf. The pan was placed on a trivet that sat on top of quartered potatoes (used for mashed). It worked like a charm. The pans are sturdy plus I got an extra item that I was not really expecting. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Nice Instant Pot accessory
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used it to steam mahi mahi in one pot and veggies in another. Had to wing the time, it took longer than I expected, but I was pleased. When using both as a stack, you don't use a lid on the bottom pot. Otherwise the trivet doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: LeMoyne

customer_reviews.title: Used in my instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I guess it matters what size instant pot one has. I have the IP-LUX60 V3. It fits even with the trivet underneath. I've used it to steam veggies, frozen dumplings, and to heat leftovers (was microwave-less at the time). Really lightweight and durable material that is easy to clean. I've put it through my dishwasher and it cleans out well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: No Plastic
customer_reviews.text: great way to heat up food in safe materials (no plastics). Everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how you can prepare a whole meal in minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Whole new way to prepare delicious meals! Love how you can prepare a whole meal in minutes with the steamer. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MimiDeb62

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to use. Must have item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought some for us and loved them so much I bought them for a friend who loves them. I really like cooking salMon in the bottom pan and veggies in the top pan. I spray oil on the pan with the fish and cook the two foods together for 12%15 minutes. Perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Griggs

customer_reviews.title: These pans work great. The only thing I couldn't figure out was ...
customer_reviews.text: These pans work great. The only thing I couldn't figure out was that you can't have lids on both the pans and close the handle.
customer_reviews.author: pam bowling

customer_reviews.title: should've researched better
customer_reviews.text: Although they are supposed to be dishwasher safe the instructions recommend handwashing and the drying to prevent spots, really?! If I put them in the dishwasher I am not going to hand dry them
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you are using both pots.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice if you use both of them at the same time, but if you only use one and put it on top of a trivet, the pot barely closes with the handle. I would suggest a one pot craddle.
customer_reviews.author: Wess

customer_reviews.title: Residue war going on
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and design of this product. I had read where some people had a problem with black residue....and this pan is guilty...trying bar keeper’s friend and lemon juice......everytime I think I got it all it magically reappears.If I had not read of it I would never have thought to look but running a paoer towel up under the rim with a knife edge and then scrubbing with Bar Keeper’s brought out a lot...so I will try a few more things...thinking it is the rubbing compound for shine...still who want’s a little rubbing compound with your chicken dinner?
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my other Instant Pot accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Cooked root vegetables in it and put the longer cooking in the bottom and quicker cooking in the top. Turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Carney

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Instapot!
customer_reviews.text: The stackable pans are a must have if you own a pressure cooker. There are so many uses for these stackable pans. I used it right away to hard boil 11 eggs using just one of the pans. I have the 4qt Instapot and both pans stack perfectly inside. Nice quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: TLPH

customer_reviews.title: Love these little pots
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to use in my Instant Pot. Some people said they get black stuff from around them but I clean well after each use by hand then put in dishwasher with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Old Texan's

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I used in my IP to cook rice over a pork loin. I did NOT see any black residue that others mentioned. The different kids will be handy too.
customer_reviews.author: M Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Nice multi-pot!
customer_reviews.text: Great multi-pot for cooking several things separately at the same time. The sling is a little awkward but works. Seller was great, item shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Martin

customer_reviews.title: Handles dont work. Black stuff is hard to clean off.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Makes cooking separate items quick and simple. I also experienced the black junk around the lips of the pans and rim. Hard to clean off initially. The handles for lifting do not work, as they do not wrap around both pans stacked inside the pot. All in all I give a 4. Had the handles worked I would have given a 5. Now I have to order a sling and hope it works for both pans while stacked....
customer_reviews.author: The Montaños

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pot accessories purchased
customer_reviews.text: Reviews convinced me these products would be a good purchase to use with my new IP. Well made, dishwasher safe. Hope to get a lot of use out of them. Could not comment on 'durability', only have these less than a week. I recommend this Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great investment for person who cooks everyday.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Awesome packaging, Great quality and perfect for steam cooking!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!!! After reading so many reviews and researching online, finally found this for my insta pot. Very well packed, quality of the steel is amazing! Very satisfied with the purchase.. Can't wait to use.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pot now a multi cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Instant Pot but up to now I have only been able to cook one food item at a time. The Stackable Steamer solves the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew4549

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pressure cooker and wanted to take my use to the next step. These pans fit the bill. Used them yesterday and they worked just as expected and were very easy to clean. These are gonna be my pressure cooker's new friends!
customer_reviews.author: "Kahului Shopper" Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These pots add so many possibilities for Instant pot cooking! Pasta comes out al dente by cooking in water inside the pot-in-pot. Add broccoli to the top pot and dinner’s just about done.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love those stackable pans for my pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love those stackable pans for my pressure cooker. They fit in perfectly, look beautiful and is easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use with my 6qt instant pot. They stack well and I can do my rice and veggies or meat ant veggies. Stack well, clean easy.
customer_reviews.author: tech mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used this today to reheat some leftovers and very satisfied with it. It took about 7 minutes in my pressure cooker and it warned my food the way I like it.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: They fit great. The carrier makes putting it in and taking ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my instant pot. They fit great. The carrier makes putting it in and taking it out very easy. Easy to steam food in
customer_reviews.author: Elle Em

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice quality set of pans
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality set of pans. The black residue is a polishing compound from the manufacturing process, that can be easily removed with hot soapy water and a brush or toothpick. I have used these a lot and dry them immediately after washing and they still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Possumtrotter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, made well worked great
customer_reviews.text: Love the hooder, made easier to take hot pot out of instant pot!!! Used it to make couple cheesecakes so far. Cant wait to try on more stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in my 6 qt IP
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Aozita Steamer Insert Pans. They look and fit perfectly in my 6QT IP. Haven't had the opportunity to use it yet but they look well made. Looking forward to see how they work.
customer_reviews.author: foxfire49

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this so I could make cheesecake in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could make cheesecake in the Instapot without having to make a foil lift. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Casara Verity

customer_reviews.title: Instant pot steamer insert
customer_reviews.text: i am very happy with the steamer insert. I allows me to lift out steamed foods easily..
customer_reviews.author: Chilimama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great quality, delivered quickly. Works in my Bella pressure cooker and in the more known Instant Pot. Perfect for holding potatoes or eggs out of the boiling water, as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Turbville

customer_reviews.title: They work as expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I order these Stackable Pans to work with our new InstantPot Ultra. My wife has now used them twice to make cheesecake. They work well and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Stackable Steamer
customer_reviews.text: This pan was just what I needed to fit into my 6 qt. Instant Pot. It arrived quickly and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Heitshusen

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up nice by hand or microwave.
customer_reviews.text: good price. looked at a few of the cheaper silicone sleeves for lifting the pots and others said they arrived all squished and out of shape. mine looked just as in the picture and perfect after dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, good package, amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I loved that the PIP works great with this product. The 2 lids, especially for steaming come in very handy and the whole package came at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Neha Kamat

customer_reviews.title: Must have for my instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these pots. Much happier with my instant pot since I'm using them. I can cook the meat in one and vegetables in the other, or cook meat in two different pots to suit different preferences in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Lambert

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pan with a lid that would fit inside my Instant Pot 6qt. This item came recommended from a recipe I was doing. The pan is well made and worked perfectly. I used it to make flawless rice. If you need a pan, two actually to fit in in you pressure cooker, look no further. This is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Beck

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer.
customer_reviews.text: Love steaming my veegies and food. Not too big and helps me arrange in the concised room.
customer_reviews.author: Jaahnavi

customer_reviews.title: One cooling tray isn’t enough
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a silicon tray to place hot pots on, but if you use both pots ( pot- in -pot) you need somewhere to place the second hot pot. I guess that’s how they encourage repeat business. Other than that it is a great system that lets you cook two different foods at the same time without them being in contact with each other. Just be sure both foods need approx. same cooking time
customer_reviews.author: Feed’n frenzie

customer_reviews.title: Black residue!
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of your product is great! There is a concern with the interior surface of the bottom ring of each steamer which contain black residue. I believe this problem could be solved with a coating of stainless steel same as applied to the exterior ring surface.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert G.

customer_reviews.title: Handle problem
customer_reviews.text: These work great in the instant pot however I have had a problem with the hand sliding out at the bottom when locking the top handles together.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Great, so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the pans 3 days ago and have not used it yet, but extremely pleased with the quality of the pans and they fit perfectly in my 6 qt, Instant Pot! After I cook something, I'll update my review!
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect in my instant pot. Easy to clean and you can stack them
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to cook two things at once, thus saving me even more time in my busy day! Makes meal prep a breeze! Top quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Rita K. Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for IPot
customer_reviews.text: This set of pans can be used so many ways. It is exactly what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Great add on to the IP
customer_reviews.text: Love it- especially for cooking rice and veggies at the same time as the main course!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I love it's multi use
customer_reviews.text: I do have to scrub on it to clean it sometimes depending on what I cook in it. I purchased this one for a family member. I have one just like it that I use very frequently
customer_reviews.author: smanyhoofs

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality product at a good price. I made cheesy scalloped potatoes and they came out perfect. The wire handle could be a bit more robust.

customer_reviews.title: Electric pressure cooker pot inserts
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Fits my pressure cooker pit perfectly and nice thickness of stainless steel.

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Has made my Instapot just a little more versatile.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 year of use 😩
customer_reviews.text: I loved these until it split tonight 😭 and I can't return them anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Unit - Not Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality material and construction. Unit fits perfectly inside my 6qt Instant Pot. Just received last week and have already used several times to steam veggies and reheat leftovers. It makes a good storage container too. Great, prompt customer service from the company too when I had a question.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty and easy to clean thank you to the company.

customer_reviews.title: Durable stainless steel stacking steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent service! I like this one better than the mesh one, more versatile with two stacking pans and handles to pull them out!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great value well made product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with my stack and cook its a great product well made only thing is the lid on this brand doesnt have a knob on top. Works great in my 6qt, 8qt ips seals nice for cooking and does a great job. good value.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

product_meta.title: Aozita Stackable Steamer Insert Pans with Sling for Instant Pot Accessories 6/8 qt - Pot in Pot, Baking, Casseroles, Lasagna Pans, Food Steamer for Pressure Cooker, Upgrade Interchangeable Lids
feature_bullets: Versatile - Two tiers stackable containers to cook different foods in the separate containers at the same time, great for pot-in-pot cooking, preserve the nutrients and vitamins, such as steaming rice, vegetables, cornbread, stuffing, meat or fish. It can be used as a dessert pan to make cheesecakes or make lasagna. It's also great for a quick re-heat of leftovers without the microwave oven.

Two Interchangeable Lids for Multi-functionality - The steaming lid is designed with holes to steam vegetables, rice, meat or fish. The air-tight lid is perfect for bake, cooking, re-heating food or storage.

Premium Quality - Insert pans made from18/8 stainless steel to ensure your health is not compromised, stable and highly resistant to corrosion. solid handle allows for safe and easy insertion and removal. Dishwasher safe for no-hassle cleanup.

Fits 5, 6 & 8 Quart Pressure Cooker - This stainless steel cooker insert is a must have accessory for any brand and type, 5/6/8 quart stovetop pressure cooker or electric pressure cooker. Fits IP-duo50, IP-duo60, IP-lux60, IP-duo80. Also fits other multi 6 quart and above pressure cookers such as Kuhn Rikon, Power XL, Mealthy, Cuisinart, Fagor, Costaway, Faberware, T-fal, Elite, GoWise, Secura, Gourmia.
RISK FREE PURCHASE: If you have any issue with our products, please don't hesitate to contact us, we will try our best to find a satisfactory solution for you within 24 hours.
